matrix-project.description: builds and simulates many different configurations, automatic nightruns on master in case of problems: please contact jkayser@de.ibm.com or alexandre.castellane@fr.ibm.com => local ocse used (not repo) => 2018.2 test on AD9V3 only

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Choose the branch you want to test

matrix-project.combinationFilter: ( ((ACT=~"hls" && HLS=="true")||(ACT=~"hdl" && HDL=="true" )) && ( (CRD=~"AD9V3" && AD9V3=="true") || (CRD=~"AD9H3" && AD9H3=="true") || (CRD=~"AD9H7" && AD9H7=="true") ) ) || (ACT=="test" && CRD=="AD9V3")

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo "Working dir is : " pwd set +x # reduce Jenkins output echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "`date` BUILD START" echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "EXECUTING FIRST SHELL FROM OpenCAPI SIM JENKINS - V1.1 - 2019 march 06 - ..." echo "****************************************************************************************" NAME=$(echo $GIT_BRANCH| cut -d'/' -f 2 |tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') # remove origin/ from branch and translate to lowercase PREFIX=$(echo $NAME| cut -d'_' -f 1) # chars up to first '_' identify need for test ACTION_TYPE=$(echo $ACT| cut -d'_' -f 1) SIM=$(echo $SIM_VIV| cut -d'_' -f 1) # chars up to first '_' identify Simulator VIV=$(echo $SIM_VIV| cut -d'_' -f 2) # chars behind first '_' identify Vivado version echo "Build with Card=$CRD Action=$ACT Action_type=$ACTION_TYPE branch_selected=$BRANCH git_branch=$NAME prefix=$PREFIX"
BSKIP=0 if [ "$ACTION_TYPE" == "hdl" ] && [ "$HDL" == "false" ]; then BSKIP=1;fi if [ "$ACTION_TYPE" == "hls" ] && [ "$HLS" == "false" ]; then BSKIP=1;fi if [ "$CRD" == "AD9V3" ] && [ "$AD9V3" == "false" ]; then BSKIP=1;fi if [ "$CRD" == "AD9H3" ] && [ "$AD9H3" == "false" ]; then BSKIP=1;fi if [ "$CRD" == "AD9H7" ] && [ "$AD9H7" == "false" ]; then BSKIP=1;fi if [ "$ACT" == "test" ]; then BSKIP=0;fi echo "examples(hdl,hls)=$HDL $HLS card_enabled(9v3,250SP)=$AD9V3 $N250SP BSKIP=$BSKIP"
case "$CRD:$ACT:$SIM" in *:hls_blowfish:* ) C="blow";ASKIP=1;; # no maintenance for blowfish # *:test:* ) C="test";ASKIP=0;; * ) C="def" ;ASKIP=0;; esac echo "card=$CRD action=$ACT Sim=$SIM VIV=$VIV case=$C ASKIP=$ASKIP"
case "$ACT" in test ) gitnames=`git ls-remote git@github.ibm.com:OC-Enablement/oc-snap.git|grep "refs/heads/"|awk '{print $2}'`;RC=$? echo "RC=$RC gitnames=$gitnames" for dir in "/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/OC_SIM_matrix"/*;do if [ -d "$dir" ];then branch="refs/heads/"`basename $dir` if [[ "$gitnames" =~ "$branch" ]];then echo "branch=$branch found in gitnames, keep dir=$dir" else echo "branch=$branch not found in gitnames, delete dir=\'$dir\'" rm -rf "$dir" # put in quotes to work for directories with blanks fi else echo "$dir is not a directory, continuing" fi done
echo "mail informing castella test triggered" mail -s "*OpenCAPI Jenkins SIMULATION started with : branch_selected=$BRANCH git_branch=$NAME prefix=$PREFIX" castella
date DSKIP=0;; *"hls_intersect"* ) if [ -f snap/defconfig/$CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig ];then DSKIP=0 else echo "$CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig does not exist" ls snap/defconfig/ DSKIP=1 fi;; * ) if [ -f snap/defconfig/$CRD.$ACT.defconfig ];then DSKIP=0 else echo "$CRD.$ACT.defconfig does not exist" ls snap/defconfig/ DSKIP=1 fi;; esac echo "defconfig SKIP=$DSKIP"
AFSused=`fs lq /afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/OC_SIM_matrix/|grep -v Used|awk '{print $4}'|sed 's/%//g'|sed 's/<//g'` SSKIP=0;msg="AFS spaced currently used=${AFSused}%" if (( AFSused > 90 ));then msg="ERROR: $msg, stopping additional builds";SSKIP=1 echo "mail sent to castella : ERROR OpenCAPI AFS space" mail -s "ERROR: OpenCAPI AFS space SIMULATION is used up to ${AFSused}%, stopping additional builds" castella #mail -s "ERROR: AFS space SIMULATION is used up to ${AFSused}%, stopping additional builds" mesnet
elif (( AFSused > 70 ));then msg="WARNING: $msg" echo "mail sent to castella : WARNING OpenCAPI AFS space" mail -s "WARNING: OpenCAPI AFS space IMAGETEST is used up to ${AFSused}%" castella #mail -s "WARNING: AFS space IMAGETEST is used up to ${AFSused}%" mesnet fi;echo "$msg"
if (( ASKIP+DSKIP+BSKIP+SSKIP > 0 ));then SKIP=1;else SKIP=0;fi echo "SKIP=$SKIP" >export_props.properties echo "properties passed to next shell:" cat export_props.properties echo "***********************************************************"

#!/bin/bash set +x # reduce Jenkins output #ulimit -c unlimited # reduce core dumps from what .profile says (kB) ulimit -S -c 128000 echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "EXECUTING SECOND SHELL FROM OpenCAPI SIM JENKINS - V1.1 - 2019 march 21 - ..." echo "****************************************************************************************" export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin # python3 needs this path setup export USERHOME=`pwd` export SNAP_ROOT=$USERHOME/snap SIM=$(echo $SIM_VIV| cut -d'_' -f 1) # chars up to first '_' identify Simulator VIV=$(echo $SIM_VIV| cut -d'_' -f 2) # chars behind first '_' identify Vivado version
echo "********************************************************************************" echo "J: LSF SETUP ..." ulimit -c unlimited
# older setup up to RH6 #export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/bin #export LSF_SERVERDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/etc #export LSF_LIBDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/lib #export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/lib #export LSF_BINDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/bin #export LSF_SUBMITTER_OSTYPE=Linux #export LSF_ENVDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/conf #LSF='-P zsort -M 2 -C 2000 -I -n 4 -R type=X86_64 -R span[hosts=1]' # Project, GB_mem, KB_core, #_processors, type of processor
# new setup for RH7 export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/bin export LSF_SERVERDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/etc export LSF_LIBDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/lib export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/lib export LSF_BINDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/bin export LSF_SUBMITTER_OSTYPE=Linux export LSF_ENVDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/conf LSF='-P zsort -M 2 -C 2000 -I -n 4 -R type=X86_64 -R osver=rh7 -R span[hosts=1]' # Project, GB_mem, KB_core, #_processors, type of processor
echo "*******************************************************************************" rm -rf ocse case $CRD in #*) branch='issue26';; *) branch='master';; esac echo "J: Get OpenCAPI Simulation Environment branch=$branch for card=$CRD..." git clone -b $branch https://github.com/OpenCAPI/ocse ocse;echo "git clone RC=$?" export OCSE_INSTALL_DIR=../ocse
cd ${SNAP_ROOT}
echo "J: export OCSE_ROOT=${USERHOME}/ocse" >snap_env.sh #echo "use local OCSE repo to get rid of undefined reference ocxl_afu_get_event_fd" #echo "export PSLSE_ROOT=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/jkayser/ocse_issue26" >snap_env.sh #echo "#PSL_DCP not included in Simulation, replaced anyhow by PSLSE" >>snap_env.sh #echo "#export PSL_DCP=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/cards/$CRD/current/b_route_design.dcp" >>snap_env.sh #echo "#setup: XILINX_LOCAL_USER_DATA=${XILINX_LOCAL_USER_DATA}, overwrite=no to prevent write access error in XilincTclStore (tclapp:load_apps)" >>snap_env.sh #echo "export XILINX_LOCAL_USER_DATA=no" >> snap_env.sh
echo "****************************************************************************************" case $SIM:$VIV in # test multiple Vivado versions in one build xcelium:2018*) # Xcelium needs Vivado 2018.1 or higher export VIV_VERSION=$VIV; export IES_VERSION="17.10.002" export CDS_INST_DIR=/afs/bb/proj/cte/tools/cds/Xcelium/${IES_VERSION} export IES_LIBS=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/ies_libs/viv${VIV_VERSION}/xce${IES_VERSION};; xcelium:*) echo "J: unsupported Vivado version $VIV for XCELIUM";exit 1;; *:2016.4) export VIV_VERSION="2016.4"; export IES_VERSION="15.10.s19" export CDS_INST_DIR=/afs/bb/proj/cte/tools/cds/Incisiv/${IES_VERSION} export IES_LIBS=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/ies_libs/viv${VIV_VERSION}/ies${IES_VERSION};; *2017.4|*2018.1|*2018.2|*2018.3|*2019.1) export VIV_VERSION=$VIV; export IES_VERSION="15.20.s18" export CDS_INST_DIR=/afs/bb/proj/cte/tools/cds/Incisiv/${IES_VERSION} # export CDS_INST_DIR=/afs/apd/func/vlsi/cds/Incisive/${IES_VERSION} # for 15.20.046 only export IES_LIBS=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/ies_libs/viv${VIV_VERSION}/ies${IES_VERSION};; *) echo "J: unsupported Vivado version $VIV";exit 1;; esac
echo "J: Vivado SETUP $VIV_VERSION ..." # AC MOP Specif export XILINX_ROOT=/opt/Xilinx export XILINXD_LICENSE_FILE=2100@pokwinlic1.pok.ibm.com . $XILINX_ROOT/Vivado/${VIV_VERSION}/settings64.sh # AC MOP Specif case $SIM:$VIV in xcelium:2018.2 ) echo "J: Cadence SETUP $IES_VERSION for Vivado 2018.2" export PATH=$CDS_INST_DIR/tools/bin:$PATH # export CDS_LIC_FILE=5280@auslnxlic01.austin.ibm.com export CDS_LIC_FILE=5280@cdsserv1.pok.ibm.com:5280@cdsserv2.pok.ibm.com export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$CDS_INST_DIR/tools/lib/64bit:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH if [ -f "$IES_LIBS/cds.lib" ]; then echo "J: IES_LIBS found in $IES_LIBS" else echo "J: WARNING: cannot find IES_LIBS=$IES_LIBS, Cadence compilation won't work";exit 1;fi ;; irun:*|IRUN:*|xcelium:* ) echo "Cadence SETUP $IES_VERSION for Vivado 2018.1" export PATH=$CDS_INST_DIR/tools/bin:$PATH export CDS_LIC_FILE=5280@hdlic10.boeblingen.de.ibm.com:5280@hdlic11.boeblingen.de.ibm.com export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$CDS_INST_DIR/tools/lib/64bit:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH # echo "J: export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$CDS_INST_DIR/tools/lib/64bit:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH" >> snap_env.sh if [ -f "$IES_LIBS/cds.lib" ]; then echo "IES_LIBS found in $IES_LIBS" else echo "J: WARNING: cannot find IES_LIBS=$IES_LIBS, Cadence compilation won't work";exit 1;fi ;; esac
echo "********************************************************************************" echo "J: Build Simulation Model ..." case $ACT in # select config & compile action 'test') echo "J: test exit 0";exit 0;; # just exit 'hls_intersect_h') make $CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig . ./snap_env.sh # execute to exploit ACTION_ROOT # AC MOP Specif echo "action compile intersect hash"; make -C ${ACTION_ROOT} clean config_h ;; 'hls_intersect_s') make $CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig . ./snap_env.sh # execute to exploit ACTION_ROOT # AC MOP Specif echo "action compile intersect sort"; make -C ${ACTION_ROOT} clean config_s ;; *DENALI*) act2=${ACT%.DENALI} echo "build action for ACT=$ACT act2=$act2" make $CRD.$act2.defconfig ;; *) # echo "J: pwd:";pwd # echo "J: pwd content:";ls # echo "J: defconfig:";ls defconfig/
# before rh7 issue we did : make $CRD.$ACT.defconfig # since we need RH7 we use LSF: bsub $LSF -J "${CRD}_${ACT}_${SIM}_defconfig" "hostname;lsb_release -a"|| exit 1 ;; esac case $SIM:$ACT in 'xsim':*|'XSIM':* ) echo "J: export SIMULATOR=xsim" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "SIM_XSIM=y" >> .snap_config;; # overwrite simulator 'irun':*DENALI|'IRUN':*DENALI ) echo "J: ENABLE_DENALI=y" >> .snap_config;make -s oldconfig echo "export SIMULATOR=irun" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "J: SIM_IRUN=y" >> .snap_config;; # overwrite simulator 'irun':*|'IRUN':* ) echo "export SIMULATOR=irun" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "J: SIM_IRUN=y" >> .snap_config;; # overwrite simulator xcelium:*DENALI) echo "ENABLE_DENALI=y" >> .snap_config;make -s oldconfig echo "export SIMULATOR=xcelium" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "J: SIM_XCELIUM=y" >> .snap_config;; # overwrite simulator xcelium:*) echo "export SIMULATOR=xcelium" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "J: SIM_XCELIUM=y" >> .snap_config;; # overwrite simulator questa:*) echo "export SIMULATOR=questa" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "J: SIM_QUESTA=y" >> .snap_config;; # overwrite simulator modelsim:*) echo "export SIMULATOR=modelsim" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "J: SIM_MODELSIM=y" >> .snap_config;; # overwrite simulator *) echo "J: WARNING: unknown simulator=$SIM, continuing with default";; esac # execute with LSF, SNAP_ROOT must reside in AFS #echo "J: PATH=$PATH" #which irun
#Added 2019 03 06 git submodule init git submodule update
bsub $LSF -J "${CRD}_${ACT}_${SIM}_model" "hostname;lsb_release -a;make model"|| exit 1
echo "********************************************************************************" echo "J: Run $SIM Simulation in LSF ..." cd ${SNAP_ROOT}/hardware/sim ##### enable SW trace # export SNAP_TRACE=0xf ##### execute locally # ./run_sim -list testlist.sh -noaet ##### execute on AFS with LSF, report error as unstable build case $SIM in # run in the proper ${ACT} directory /tests/hw_test.sh 'xsim'|'XSIM' ) bsub $LSF -J "${CRD}_${ACT}_${SIM}" "${SNAP_ROOT}/hardware/sim/run_sim -list ../../actions/${ACT}/tests/hw_test.sh -noaet"||exit 100;;
# older way to run with capi snap # 'xsim'|'XSIM' ) bsub $LSF -J "${CRD}_${ACT}_${SIM}" "./run_sim -list testlist.sh -noaet"||exit 100;; # 'irun'|'IRUN' ) bsub $LSF -J "${CRD}_${ACT}_${SIM}" "./run_sim -irun -list testlist.sh -noaet"||exit 100;; # *) bsub $LSF -J "${CRD}_${ACT}_${SIM}" "./run_sim -list testlist.sh -noaet"||exit 100;;
esac
